Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔へ向かおう。 その頂上に<Cyan>「幻の庭」<White>はある。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's head to the tower of nereg. The garden of illusions is at the top.

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔があるネジャナ半島は ノルゼンから見て北東の方角だヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: The Tower of Nereg is on the Nejana peninsula, which is northeast of Nolzen!
Entry.Notes: Eugene first line is "Let's head to the tower of nereg. The garden of illusions is at the top."
